titleStmt.title: 1 ) Mimāṃsānyāyaprakāśa by Āpadeva 2) Śāstradīpikā by Pārthasārathimiśra. 1st Adhyāya

repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary:
The manuscript contains two texts namely ) Mimāṃsānyāyaprakāśa by Āpadeva and 2) Śāstradīpikā by Pārthasārathimiśra. 1st Adhyāya . The state of the folio is very fragile, folio are darkened so it is difficult to read. Numeration of the both the text is separate.
Palm leaf used as a support material is newer than the original manuscript folio. On the front guard folio āpadevī and pārthasārathī is written in Devanagari script in pencil. Numer XIV written in pink chalk in the left margin. Also 14 is written at the centre. Back guard folio has some black fungal spots.

msItem.title: Mimāṃsānyāyaprakāśa or Āpadevī
msItem.author: Āpadeva
msItem.incipit: (t59-1v 1) iha khalu paramakāruṇikena bhagavatā jaiminiṛṣiṇā athāto dharmajījñāsetyādinā dvādaśvādhyāyeṣu dharmo vicārata tatra ve(gap due to broken side.)
msItem.explicit: (t59-26v 5) niśreyasahetu . ṅa ca tadarpaṇa budhyānuṣṭhāne pramāṇābhāḥ yat karoṣi yadaśnāsi yad juhoṣi dadāsi yat yattapasyasi kaunteya tat kuruṣva devārpaṇamiti smṛteḥ asyaścāṣṭakādismṛtivat prāmāṇyā (t59-26v 6) dityanyatra vistaraḥ kvāhaṃ mandamatiḥ kveyaṃ prakriyā bhāṭṭasammatā tasmātbhaktivilāsoyaṃ govindagurupādayoḥ . graṃtharūpo madīyo yaṃ vāgvyāpāra suśobhanaḥ anena prīyatāṃ devo govi (t59- 26v 7) ado bhaktavatsalaḥ
msItem.finalRubric: (t59- 26v 7) iti śīrmadanantadevasununā āpadevena kṛtam mīmāṃsānyāyaprakāśanasaṃñjakaṃ mimāṃsā prakaraṇaṃ saṃpūrṇaṃ śrīdakṣiṇāmūrtaye namaḥ bhārgavarāyaparamagurave namaḥ hariḥ (t59- 26v 8) oṃ śubhamastu.

msItem.title: Śāstradīpikā (1st Adhyāya)
msItem.author: Pārthasārathimiśra
msItem.incipit: (t60- 1v 1) pra(gap of two letters due darkened folio.) ṃvṛtti yāmuktvādātvarthakyamatadarthāśro?tasmādanityamucyate athāto dharmajījñāsetyatra pramāṇasvaraupasaṃyana…
msItem.explicit: (t60- 35r 7) vṛtaśca (gap of a letter) strata sūtiśca caritaścanirastadoṣaḥ . yat pramāṇamiha siddhamatam apararantat bhedaprayogānviniyogadi cintā.
msItem.finalRubric: (t60- 35r 7) ityupādhyāya śrī (gap of approximately 1 or 2 letters due to broken side.) (t60- 35r 8) (gap of approximately 11 or 12 letters due to broken folio.) prathamasyaādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ samāptaścādhyāyaḥ hariḥ oṃ śubhama[stu] (supplied as folio is broken.)

support.p: Palm leaf is used as a support. These guard folio are newer than the original manuscript folio.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numeration in the left margin. Two texts are numbered separately. t59 - 1v-26v. t60 1v-35r.

additions.desc: hariḥ oṃ is written in the left margin on t6- 1v.

listBibl.bibl:
1) The Mimāṃsānyāyaprakāśa by Āpadeva, Critical notes and edited by Mahadev Sharma revised edition by Narayana Ram Acarya, Nirnaya Sagar press, Mumbai 1943.
2) The Śāstradīpikā with the commentary by Mayukhamalika (from second pada of forst chapter to the end) by Somanatha, and with the commentary of Yuktisnehaprapuraṇi with Gūḍhārthavivaraṇa (on the first Tarkapada) by Ramakrishna, edi by Dharmadattasuri, Tukarama Jivaji, Nirnayasagar press 1915.

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added to saperate words. Unclear words are put in the brackets.

TEI.text: (t59-1v 1) iha khalu paramakāruṇikena bhagavatā jaiminiṛṣiṇā athāto dharmajījñāsetyādinā dvādaśvādhyāyeṣu dharmo vicārata tatra ve(gap due to broken side.) (t59-26v 5) niśreyasahetu . ṅa ca tadarpaṇa budhyānuṣṭhāne pramāṇābhāḥ yat karoṣi yadaśnāsi yad juhoṣi dadāsi yat yattapasyasi kaunteya tat kuruṣva devārpaṇamiti smṛteḥ asyaścāṣṭakādismṛtivat prāmāṇyā (t59-26v 6) dityanyatra vistaraḥ kvāhaṃ mandamatiḥ kveyaṃ prakriyā bhāṭṭasammatā tasmātbhaktivilāsoyaṃ govindagurupādayoḥ . graṃtharūpo madīyo yaṃ vāgvyāpāra suśobhanaḥ anena prīyatāṃ devo govi (t59- 26v 7) ado bhaktavatsalaḥ iti śīrmadanantadevasununā āpadevena kṛtam mīmāṃsānyāyaprakāśanasaṃñjakaṃ mimāṃsā prakaraṇaṃ saṃpūrṇaṃ śrīdakṣiṇāmūrtaye namaḥ bhārgavarāyaparamagurave namaḥ hariḥ (t59- 26v 8) oṃ śubhamastu.

(t60- 1v 1) pra(gap of two letters due darkened folio.) ṃvṛtti yāmuktvādātvarthakyamatadarthāśro?tasmādanityamucyate athāto dharmajījñāsetyatra pramāṇasvaraupasaṃyana… (t60- 35r 7) vṛtaśca (gap of a letter) strata sūtiśca caritaścanirastadoṣaḥ . yat pramāṇamiha siddhamatam apararantat bhedaprayogānviniyogadi cintā. ityupādhyāya śrī (gap of approximately 1 or 2 letters due to broken side.) (t60- 35r 8) (gap of approximately 11 or 12 letters due to broken folio.) prathamasyaādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ samāptaścādhyāyaḥ hariḥ oṃ śubhama[stu] (supplied as folio is broken.)
